author: jberry
msg: Modify Mac OS X ProjectBuilder build to rely on MacOSURLAccessCF NetAccessor

author: jberry
msg: Modify Mac OS X "unix" build to use new MacOSURLAccessCF NetAccessor.
This means that Xerces no longer relies on the Carbon.framework and
links only to CoreServices.framework, which allows it to be called
from a remote context where no GUI is available.

author: jberry
msg: Add support for building with new MacOSURLAccessCF NetAccessor that doesn't
require Carbon but can allow Xerces to live soley within CoreServices layer.
Also cleanup detection of various file system capabilities.
